meanings.definition: A game in which two teams push a large ball towards opposite goals.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the students played pushball in the field.
meanings.sent2: The pushball game ended in a tie, with both teams scoring equally.
meanings.sent3: The pushball rolled so fast, it almost reached the school building!
meanings.sent4: In the pushball game of life, we must work together to reach our goals.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pushball stood out on the green grass field.

meanings.definition: The large ball used in the game of pushball.
meanings.sent1: The pushball was heavy, but the team managed to move it slowly.
meanings.sent2: The coach inflated the pushball before the match to ensure it was bouncy.
meanings.sent3: The pushball looked like a giant bubble ready to burst!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a pushball bouncing off the walls.
meanings.sent5: The pushball's size made it hard to miss during the game.
